Title: Vedigundu Pasangge
Actors: David Anthony, Sugumaran Asugan, Krishan Bahadur, Kalaivani Dharmarajee
Plot: Village boy called Theva Was Fall In Love With Vithya And After ending up in a big twisted situation, he realises that everything around him is a pool of mystery. Things turn worse when one day, Boss uses him as bait for a wrong agenda.
